Uses of Interface
org.apache.ignite.spi.checkpoint.CheckpointSpi

  • Packages that use CheckpointSpi 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.configuration
    Contains configuration-related classes.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.checkpoint.cache
    Contains cache-based implementation for checkpoint SPI.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.checkpoint.jdbc
    Contains JDBC implementation for checkpoint SPI.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.checkpoint.noop
    Contains default no-op checkpoint SPI implementation.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.checkpoint.sharedfs
    Contains shared file system implementation for checkpoint SPI.

    • Uses of CheckpointSpi in org.apache.ignite.configuration

      Methods in org.apache.ignite.configuration that return CheckpointSpi 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CheckpointSpi[] IgniteConfiguration.getCheckpointSpi()
      Should return fully configured checkpoint SPI implementation.
      Methods in org.apache.ignite.configuration with parameters of type CheckpointSpi 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IgniteConfiguration IgniteConfiguration.setCheckpointSpi​(CheckpointSpi... cpSpi)
      Sets fully configured instance of CheckpointSpi.

      class  CacheCheckpointSpi
      This class defines cache-based implementation for checkpoint SPI.
